summary:
South America is a continent in the Western and Southern Hemispheres, with a small part in the Northern Hemisphere. It's bordered by the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans and is home to 12 countries, including Brazil, Argentina, and Colombia. It also has two dependent territories and one internal territory. South America has a population of over 434 million, with Brazil being the most populous country.

The continent's geography features the Andes mountains in the west and highlands and lowlands in the east, with major rivers like the Amazon. Most people live along the coasts, while the interior is less populated. South America's culture is a mix of Indigenous, European, and African influences, with Spanish and Portuguese as the main languages.
title: South America
